hearings.Business: Both parties and advocates are not present. For compromise between parties according to their request. Call on 6-11-2013.
At request for compromise between parties. Call on 18-11-2013.
Couusel for plaintiff filed memo, stating that the plaintiff not pressing the suit as his claim was satisfied. In view of the memo suit is dismissed as not pressed without costs.
